conclusion: Calculate the magnetic force from time t1 to t3 with v = 0, F = 800N.
Calculate the magnetic force when the velocity is 80m/s, F = 0N.
Calculate the average magnetic force from t1 to t3, which is 400N.
Calculate the acceleration of the mover from t1 to t3, a = 80m/s^2.
Calculate the time it takes for the mover to reach 80m/s, t = 1s.
Calculate the current I of the constant current source, I = 40A.
